title: I AM - The Key to Manifesting
description: I Am - The Key to Manifesting contains great spiritual wisdom about who you truly are. Knowing yourself as the I AM you have the power to create your experiences and eliminate suffering simply by aligning yourself with the truth of who you are. This book will guide you step by step toward finding you true Self, bringing forth a greater understanding of the world you live in and guide you toward truly making a difference in other people's lives.
author: Vivian Amis
